<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soaring Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4739) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Untamed Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4713)

</column>

---

Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below. Add the bat and bird shapes in [_aerial form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1437) to your untamed form list. If you have [Insect Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4730), you also add the wasp shape to your untamed form list. If you have [Ferocious Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4734), you also add the pterosaur shape to your untamed form list. Whenever you use untamed form to take a shape that grants you a specific Acrobatics modifier, you gain a +1 status bonus to Acrobatics checks.

<title level="2">Soaring Shape leads to...</title>
[Dragon Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4749), [Reactive Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=4754)
name: Soaring Shape
